CustomField.formula: IF( OR( Sales_User__c = 'slam', Sales_User__c = 'jmorr', Sales_User__c = 'amala', Sales_User__c = 'uqure', Sales_User__c = 'jyoun' ), 'CSS', IF( OR( Sales_User__c = 'aivan', Sales_User__c = 'bmath', Sales_User__c = 'gthom', Sales_User__c = 'oint' ), 'House', Sales_User__c ) )
CustomField.label: Report Sales Owner
